participant_1.background:

i have two sons that i am raising by myself.
i take things very literally.
I moved to Los Angeles from Tokyo and my brothers helped me a lot, so I am making lunch for them to show my appreciation.
I joined a ski club and met a great group of friends.

i am dissatisfied with the school life i have had so far.

content.text: Hi! I'm making lunch for my brothers today to show my appreciation for all the help they've given me since I moved from Tokyo to Los Angeles.
What are you making? I'm going to bake my grandson a chocolate cake for his birthday.
I'm making a nice chicken stir fry. I'm also making some homemade sushi.
Sushi sounds delicious! I love eating sushi. What kind are you making?
I'm making California rolls and shrimp tempura rolls.
I love California rolls! They're one of my favorite types of sushi.
I'm glad you like them! I'm also making some miso soup to go with the lunch.
Miso soup is so good! It's one of my favorite soups.
I'm glad you like it! I'm going to start cooking soon. I'll let you know when lunch is ready.
Hey, I just finished cooking lunch. It's ready if you want to come over.
